metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12755 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: fishProtocol::establishConnection in fish/fish.cpp in KDE kio-extras through 20.04.0 makes a cacheAuthentication call even if the user had not set the keepPassword option. This may lead to unintended KWallet storage of a password.

criterions.comment: kio-extras package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:20.08.3-1').
